meta.description: Optimize the number of trips for transporting tires using cargo planes and ultrawide trucks.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for tire delivery.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each mode of transportation in terms of number of tires.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per trip for each mode of transportation.

params.name: min_tires
params.description: Minimum number of tires that need to be transported.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode of transportation.

objective.name: min_total_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips.

constraints.name: tire_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of tires are transported.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the available budget.

constraints.name: plane_truck_balance
constraints.description: The number of plane trips cannot exceed the number of truck trips.
